name: D-Hero
author: genesis206
notes:
Made it to KoG from Plat 4 with 34 wins. Lost 6 games total, 3 of them in legend 3.

Offerings to the Doomed was a 3rd econ thru plat, then a super Rush until legend 3 which helped a lot. Offerings won 3 of the last 5 games. Versatility allowed me to kill lava golems, Amazoness Queens and other problem monsters in awesome ways. May want to play 2 of them.

Trunade was a second cyclone until legend 3. Everything else is pretty standard.
